text: 14.9 Part 1 sets out that proposals should follow a design-led approach in line with the London Plan and the National Design Guide. The National Design Guide says that “well-designed places and buildings come about when there is a clearly expressed ‘story’ for the design concept and how Tower Hamlets Local Plan 151 PEOPLE, PLACES AND SPACES it has evolved into a design proposal. This explains how the concept influences the layout, form, appearance, and details of the proposed development. It may draw its inspiration from the site, its surroundings, or a wider context” (paragraph 16).
